TV.translation[0].definitions[0].example: He’s the top TV presenter for children’s programmes.
a TV series based on the novel
I watched the film on TV.
TV.translation[0].note_box[0].heading: GRAMMAR: Patterns with TV
TV.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0].e: You watch or see something on TV or on the TV
We saw the game on TV
TV.translation[0].note_box[0].items[0].b: We saw the game in TV
TV.translation[0].note_box[0].items[1].e: You say that a programme, person etc is on TV or on the TV
The news is on TV right now
TV.translation[0].note_box[0].items[1].b: The news is in TV right now
